commentary.revenue_performance: Revenue grew 4% on a 12-month basis; value and volume growth were about the same at 6.5% for the FMCG industry. Rural growths are starting to come back, which will aid overall growth.
commentary.profitability: Operating profit was 16.5% of net revenue. Profitability was impacted by an exceptional item cost of INR 24.64 crores related to the Voluntary Retirement Scheme (VRS).
commentary.business_outlook: Management's strategy is to continue focusing on driving **market share** and **top line growth**. The company is actively working on the RTM project, banking on it for great future results.
commentary.key_challenges: Commodity costs are going up marginally (Flour, Sugar, Cocoa). Management is working to balance the commodity increases as well as competitive pricing actions.
commentary.strategic_initiatives: Direct reach is at 28.2 lakh outlets and rural distributors are at 30,000. The **Route-to-Market project (with Bain)** has started some pilots in top metros. The new processed cheese plant has been commercialized.
commentary.market_conditions: Moderate inflationary conditions and better monsoons are aiding the revival of the rural economy.
